about.title: About me
about.lead: I’m Grégoire Fortuné, currently studying computer science at the IUT of Aubière (France).
about.description: A few highlights to understand who I am and what drives my work.

paragraphs: I’m in my first year of the B.U.T Informatique program where I build strong fundamentals in algorithms, web development, and software design.
The curriculum blends core CS topics (programming, databases, networking) with transversal skills such as communication, project management, and finance, giving me a broader view of the job.
I’m looking for a 10-week internship starting May 2026 to apply this knowledge within a professional team and keep learning by doing.

about.photoAlt: Portrait of Grégoire Fortuné in a garden

more.title: A bit more about me
paragraphs: I’m ambitious and keep pushing myself with harder challenges. Curiosity drives me to explore new topics and learn fresh skills whenever I can.
I currently live in Auvergne for my studies even though my hometown is elsewhere, which taught me adaptability and openness to new environments.
Sports help me stay balanced: handball, volleyball, and climbing teach me teamwork, resilience, and focus—values I bring to every project.
